titles.title: A resolution designating November 19, 2021, as "TSA Appreciation Day".
A resolution designating November 19, 2021, as "TSA Appreciation Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution designates November 19, 2021, as Transportation Security Administration (TSA) Appreciation Day. It also recognizes the service and sacrifices made by employees and officers of the TSA and the role such employees and officers play in keeping the United States secure.
